item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-06-19
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Zaftig's Delicatessen (335 Harvard St, Brookline). #
  • I'm at The Mall at Chestnut Hill (199 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Listen: Soulwax Remix LCD Soundsystem's "You Wanted a Hit": via @addthis #
  • I'm at Starbucks (Brookline/Chestnut Hill) (1154 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at captain mardens (279 linden st, Boston). #
